file_content.text: Been observing you, yes. Great pleasure to see, yes.
You dismantle all mercenary equipment, much more than ever hoped for, yes.
Components you acquire keep my resistance nuisances flourishing for many months. In your debt immensely, yes. You have my thanks.
Happy to help.
I want compensation.
I see, yes. Commitment to cause not true motivator for you, no. Fine, I pay.
You're annoying.
Sometimes I rub people wrong, yes. Not sure why, no. I leave you alone.
Stick around, maybe. See how much nuisance we cause, yes.
You waiting for right opportunity to acquire components, maybe? Meanwhile, mercenaries grow stronger, yes.
Hello there. Been observing you, yes. I see your purpose here is to kill and maim Imperials, yes?
No need to deny. I endorse this, yes. Tell no one, but I lead a secret underground resistance. Your appearance here is most fortunate, yes.
Secret resistance, huh?
Speak plainly.
I try to communicate in a clear and concise manner, yes.
I'm skeptical.
I try not to annoy you, no. Start over on better feet, yes.
My people get in Imperial's way, orchestrate what I call "nuisances." But we are stretched for resources, yes.
Mercs here work for Empire, train with state of art gear, yes. My nuisances become much bigger problem for the enemy with some of that gear.
I'm in. Whatever you need.
I'm in. Whatever you need.
Love your spirit and commitment, yes. Refreshing, yes.
Anyone can steal stuff.
We have skills only in darkness. Strike from crevices, tiny places, yes. Gear is in open, plain sight. We never make it.
Mercenary training equipment have components I can turn into special traps and explosives, yes.
You dismantle equipment, bring me components, yes. My resistance make life weepy for them. I wait, yes.
Not my job. [Refuse quest]
Disappointed, yes. Wish you the best, maybe.
Thirteen new nuisances already, yes. Grandest still to come. Empire pants wet here, yes.
Mercenaries everywhere, yes. Not safe, no.
